Tell me more about mahendra singh dhoni.

Mahendra Singh Dhoni is an Indian professional cricketer who plays as a right-handed batter and a wicket-keeper. Widely regarded as one of the most prolific cricketers, he has led India to three ICC titles. Dhoni was born on July 7, 1981, in Ranchi, Bihar (now Jharkhand), India. He is also known for his exploits in the Indian Premier League, playing for Chennai Super Kings.
